segments.text: Yes , we've got a very tender new shipment from the mainland . It is a weekend special .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much is it a pound ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One pound and fifty pence a pound .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I'll get three pounds of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here it is . Four pounds and fifty pence in all .
segments.speaker: S2
